text: Anker Henrik Jørgensen (13 July 1922 - 20 March 2016) was a Danish politician. He served as the Prime Minister of Denmark from 1972 to 1973, then again from 1975 to 1982. He was also the Minister of Foreign Affairs. Jørgensen was born on 13 July 1922, in Copenhagen. He died in Copenhagen, at the age of 93.Anker Joergensen, Danish Premier During Oil Crises, Dies at 93 ==References== ==Other websites== * Anker Jørgensen fansite * "Plads til os alle" profile * Jørgensen, Anker Henrik at Leksikon.org Category:1922 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Denmark Category:Politicians from Copenhagen
title: Anker Jørgensen
